tool.name: List all document IDs
tool.help:
**What it does**
Obtains a list of ID values for all documents in a small corpus of internal documents from the Franklin D. Roosevelt Library. The documents (previously classified) include internal administration correspondence on the topic of US-Japanese relations in the 6 month period prior to December 7, 1941.
**License**
All documents in the FDR corpus are in `the public domain <https://copyright.gov/pr/pdomain.html>`_
